acf.egsr_quicktip: YOU CRAVE PASSION AND GIDDY HEIGHTS, BUT ALWAYS SEEK TO STAY GROUNDED...
acf.egsr_step1_descr:
YOU CRAVE PASSION AND GIDDY HEIGHTS, BUT ALWAYS SEEK TO STAY GROUNDED...

Wow! You have an interesting soul reading, {FIRSTNAME}!

Grounded and sensible, yet gracefully sensuous. I feel an absolutely beautiful presence about you.

Something tells me that you're equally at home working in the garden as you are socializing at an elegant gathering, dressed to turn every head as you enter the room.

Your vibration shows that the world should be yours for the taking…

But... I feel that your soul is craving growth right now...

Do you tend to stick to a strict schedule to ground yourself?

Grounding is the key word… to feel centered and strong, your soul food is stability.

A grounded soul thrives on solid relationships, routine, and a cozy home base, making stable foundations to build your life on.

You’re an incredibly resourceful person, {FIRSTNAME}.

And you’re able to wield your magic wherever it’s needed… creating living spaces, nurturing relationships, or working on ideas.

Your soul is infused with great purpose... and does everything to perfection.

But this perfectionist streak can be an issue at times…when things don’t go quite as planned... upsetting the balance... shaking your reality.

You’ve always been thankful of your down-to-earth nature, but have been looking out for signs on how to connect more deeply with your spiritual side…

And I sense that you are at a crossroads in your life regarding moving toward your spiritual side now so you can fulfill your soul’s mission for this lifetime.

From my reading today I feel that an additional “Energy Reading” is necessary to find out exactly what’s been holding you back all these years…
acf.egsr_step2_descr:
IF YOU WANT THE MOST OUT OF LIFE, YOU MUST LEARN TO REACH FOR THE SKY WITH YOUR FEET ON THE GROUND…

Your energy is thoroughly grounded {FIRSTNAME}, firmly rooted in your body.

And it flows to the physical pleasures of movement, touch, taste, and connection to the natural world.

It’s amazing how you can direct your energy, providing stability… for yourself and your loved ones… ever-nurturing, playful and loyal.

However... your energy reading suggests that in order to grow spiritually, you must release fears surrounding loss.

If you don’t, this can block your progress, stirring up the darker energies of possessiveness, control and even jealousy.

It’s incredibly hard to raise your frequency when you grasp onto what you already have. This restricts growth… yours and the growth of your loved ones.

“Hold on loosely, but don’t let go…”

The habit of clinging will be overcome when you tune into the abundant resources within and around you.

Then you’ll finally be able to see… there is nothing to lose and everything to gain.

You can stay grounded... but open your life to growth....

I also sense that this is a very critical time on your path, {FIRSTNAME}.

The decisions you make at this time will have a huge impact on your life for years to come.

And… the way to know if you’re on the right path is usually found through a light reading…

I’d like to give you one for free, but first I need to ask you a few questions…
acf.egsr_step3_descr:
I believe there’s an amazing opportunity on the horizon for you…

Are you seeking to ground yourself through people and possessions?

When you become thoroughly grounded in yourself, your personal energy will connect to the energy around you and your light will shine bright.
You already have a love of nature.

On a spiritual level, you are nature… deep inside you can feel this.

When you care for your soul, with the love and compassion you show others, animals and nature, endless possibilities will appear…

You’ll be able to jump in the directions they offer... truly embracing your creative self…

Bringing people, pleasures, finances and possessions into your life…

With your feet on the ground, you will be able to reach for the sky.

When you truly set your mind to something, I can sense it will happen!

I sense that you are ready to open the next chapter of your limitless life?
